mapper.insert: insert into tbl_review(review_no, product_id, userid, review_title, review_content, review_star) values (seq_review.nextval, #{product_id}, #{userid}, #{review_title}, #{review_content}, #{review_star})
mapper.update: update tbl_review set review_title = #{review_title}, review_content = #{review_content}, review_updateDate = sysdate, review_star = #{review_star} where review_no = #{review_no}
mapper.select: select count(review_no) from tbl_review where product_id = #{product_id}
